Title: Paul & Robin
Plot: Paul constantly checks his stove and electrical outlets because he's afraid they may start a fire and kill everyone in his apartment complex. The problem has all but ended his promising musical career. Meanwhile, Robin spends up to 20 hours a day cleaning her house, and even gets her husband and children to join her. Through therapy, Paul will try to rebuild his music career, and Robin will try to restore her family's well being.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
